column7: The perfect tool for getting up close and personal with devastating impact.
column8: "What a way to make an entrance!"

column7: Wood, phosphorus and a frictional surface combine to quickly reproduce one of mankind's greatest achievements over and over again.
A reliable handgun popular with law enforcement and military elite. Boasting a full auto mode that fires 1,200 rounds per minute. This pistol is non-negotiable 9 mm authority.
column8: "Is that a machine pistol in your pocket?"

column7: Kit of preparedness to treat most common ailments and wounds.
A classic revolver that gained its reputation due to its precision and power. It hardly ever misfires, and can quickly be concealed in a pocket or waistband.
Instantly recognized by its wooden stock and banana shaped magazine, this simple yet dependable weapon is the archetypal rifle of insurgents, freedom fighters, and terrorists across the globe.
Mainly used for purification and highly recommended to treat poisoning and overdoses. The microporosity of the material is unsurpassed in terms of absorption.
Military style boots honed for foot protection. Perfect for a variety of climates. They may seem clumsy, but the sore truth is that they always come out on top.
Modern man found ergonomic ways to store items. These carry their weight in gold.
Candy apple red might not be the best camo, but you'll thrill them as you kill them.
Some helmets makes you look good, others make you look like a fool. This is the pretty non-bulletproof version.
Rumor has it that really good steel comes from Sweden. Well honed, this knife will cut through just about anything.
Manufactured precision-made ammunition, stable and able. The best choice for your weapons.
Both protection and enhancement in one. Makes you look beefed up and adds good protection against any blunt violence.
Designed to hold a person's head above water and signal attention with bright color. These well-crafted padded jackets can withstand a punch or two. Keeps you bobbing up most unexpectedly.
Key ingredient for most motorized vehicles, highly flammable and invaluable in the production of improvised incendiary weapons.
column8: "Alluring fumes that'll go to your head."

column7: Color the world around you or inhale it to see perhaps even greater colors. Unknown duration.
column8: "Put some more color into this world."

column7: A basic tool refined with enhanced functionality. Can provide shelter, food, escape or discoveries.
Well rolled rods that, despite their size, will make quite an impression.
The alluring glow to the little pile of valuables gives you a happy feeling. Someone’s been collecting. Now, it’s yours to cash in.
Quieter than most projectile weapons and more powerful than a sling shot. Works on land and in water. These are rarely found unmodified.
Packed with electrical lighting power to cut bright cones through darkness, shake or smack if not working properly.
A real nut buster! The last tool a real mechanic would ever heft but still more flexible than everything else in the tool box. Loosen or tighten up - all in one.
column8: "Sweat or blood, a tool fit for both trades."

column7: A fistful of torch. This small item is a true art of engineering, that can fire up under the most dire circumstances.
Gasoline and electric versions exist. Both are very dangerous, but the roar of the gasoline version far outweighs the other in terms of intimidation.
A trusted pump-action shotgun issued in many variations. Owning one of these will change your life by ending others.
Good for spying from great distances. Some models feature zoom lenses or other extras.
Always make sure you secure your ride, prisoner or box of supplies thoroughly.
For those special moments of personal reflection before or after the slaughter.
High-quality fabric made to withstand stress and heavy loads. A hiker's item of choice.
column8: "How long is a piece of rope? Now you know."

column7: Made in faraway lands, by the best of hands. Soft rubber soles, and sturdy leather protection. A perfect fit for healthy feet. You´ll never want to run out of these.
Requires sun, moisture and human-friendly temperatures for the seeds to grow and bear fruit. Treat it with love. This is one of the few things in this world that actually gives something in return.
Might just let you live to declare ”That was a close call!”.
Crafted from lightweight fabrics. Designed to withstand Mother Nature’s shifting temperament. A vital piece of equipment that is highly sought after.
column8: "When it's cold outside and you want to sleep in."

column7: Highly reliable tech that grapples through stickiness. Can fix most damaged materials and keep it functioning - good enough.
column8: "If a strip of this doesn't fix it, nothing will."

column7: A fine polished reflective glass is a true multipurpose tool for survivors of all Eras.
column8: "Objects may appear closer than they are."

column7: A precision instrument for safe guidance if you know how to use it.
When you have to quickly take a knee for that critical shot, a little bit of padding can help you keep your focus on target.
column8: "Down on your knees and feel good about it."

column7: Block body fluids or splinters, hot or cold stuff. Features a tough visor that's easy to clean.
column8: "Spatters or sparks, protects your face from ugly marks."

column7: People usually keep their valuables locked away. Keys fit into locks. Now just find the matching pairs.
column8: "These might be the keys to Another World."

column7: Durable, flexible container that holds liquids for survival or attack. They come in a variety of configurations
column8: "More common than fish in the sea."

column7: Engineering at its best. It's made for hazardous environments where respiratory functions would be seriously damaged without filtration.
Created to alter the biological or mental state of the user. They can stop bleeding, treat insanity, induce hallucinations or put men to sleep. Most often they are taken orally, swallowed whole.
Thin metal container that preserves edibles. Often stacked as a status symbol in special cabinets, they usually contain vegetables or meat. Special tools may be used to open them efficiently.
Intellectual property should not to be underestimated. With a book in your hand you might come out as a pundit instead of a bandit.
column8: "Someone had a lot to say in the name of someone else."

column7: When the nights and the seasons are against you, hug this one a little tighter.
Comes in many shapes, but once emptied becomes, "the best I ever had."
column8: "Liquid courage in the form of single or blended."

column7: A solid piece of equipment, well worth its weight. Once you start using it, you can’t be without it.
Excellent to conceal contraband on your body, or more mundanely, keep your arms and legs dry in harsh weather conditions.
The best substitute for a lamp in any low tech society. Any hardcore prepper's first choice of light source.
Glasses come in all forms and shapes but they most often make you look like someone not to hit in the face.
column8: "Put these on and a new world might be revealed."

column7: For longer journeys you always need a reliable container. Never miss a chance to fill 'er up!
column8: "Bring your own drink to the party."

column7: Pressure filled canister for dousing flames in awkward places. Can kill a fire in a blink of an eye if handled properly.
A punched lightweight sheet of metal, bendable, but sturdy as well. Found everywhere, usually perforated and corroded, but one or two in mint condition is a real haul.
